title: Basic SpeechRecognition tutorial
content: in this tutorial you will learn how to use your smartphone to recognize what you are saying.

Select **Text2Speech** to make your smartphone vibrate

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/SpeechRecognition-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open the camera locally.

Select the language in which you want the smartphone to recognize what you are saying

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/SpeechRecognition/language-component.png)

Move the **SpeechRecognition** component into the workspace

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/SpeechRecognition/text-component.png)
Type something to say in the text field and select a language from the list

Look in the last detection box to see what your smartphone last detected.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/SpeechRecognition/detection.png)
